text:
Butterfly Network | NY | On-site, Full-time | Biotech/AI | VISA for US-based candidates | https://www.butterflynetwork.com/

Imagine a world in which cost and training are no longer barriers for access to life-saving technology. We're a rapidly growing, innovative, extremely well-funded start-up, that is changing the landscape of IoT/medicine. As we grow, we're seeking experienced engineers to help build & take ownership of several aspects of our cloud architecture, design and build visually beautiful iOS and android apps for our future products or develop new machine learning algorithms while also having a direct and immense, real-world impact.

• Senior C++ Software Engineer

• Senior Full-Stack Engineers and Technical Lead

• Senior Android Engineers

• Senior iOS Engineers

• Senior Product Designer

• Machine Learning Research Scientist

And more! Feel free to check our website (butterflynetwork.com) for more details or send me an email at: maria@butterflynetwork.com
